pages.text: Has a 2.5% chance to spawn from a $(l:revice/mobs/giff_junior)Giff Junior$(/l)

Appears in:$(li)Kamen Rider Revice (2021, TV show)$(br2)Health: 120$(br2)Drops$(li)2-4 $(l:revice/items/proto_vistamp)Proto Vistamps$(/l)$(li)1 $(l:revice/items/vistamps#daiouika_vistamp)Daiouika Proto Vistamp$(/l)$(li)1 $(l:revice/items/vistamps#rolling_vistamp)Rolling Vistamp$(/l) (20%)$(li)1 $(l:revice/items/vistamps#proto_chameleon_vistamp)Chameleon Proto Vistamp$(/l) (60%)$(li)1 $(l:revice/arsenal/paranegro)Paranegro$(/l) (20%)$(br2)Bosses$(li)$(l:revice/mobs/anomalocaris_deadman)Anomalocaris Deadman$(/l) (if you have the $(l:revice/items/vistamps#rolling_vistamp)Rolling Vistamp$(/l) in your inventory)
